QuestData.Title: Do the Imp-Possible
QuestData.Description: The satyr hide their corrupted moonwell behind an impenetrable barrier of demonic fire. Their forces must have some way of getting through it.$B$BInterrogating the satyr will be useless, but the imps they consort with will be easily swayed. I have a specific one in mind, as well...$B$BIn the foothills to the east, a lone imp has been seen wandering, far from the other demons. He should prove easy pickings. Weaken him with combat, and then use this enchanted sack to capture him. Then I'll do the talking...
QuestData.LogDescription: Weaken Impsy and use the Enchanted Imp Sack to capture him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have an imp for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Imps are creatures of deception. With so many of them spotted at Shadowlurk Ridge, I'm positive something is being hidden there.$B$BOur little friend will tell us exactly how to find it... if he doesn't want to go back in the sack.
